name: @sparesparrow/mcp-prompts
description: MCP server for managing prompts and templates with project orchestration capabilities

scripts.build: npx tsc && npm run copy-static-files && chmod +x build/index.js build/cli.js && node ./scripts/build/fix-build.js && node ./scripts/build/ensure-config.js
scripts.copy-static-files: cp package.json build/ && cp README.md build/ && mkdir -p build/data/prompts build/data/backups build/services build/core build/config && cp -rf config/* build/config/ || echo 'Warning: config directory not copied' && cp -f src/utils/config.js build/utils/ || echo 'Warning: src/utils/config.js not copied'
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts,js --exec "npm run build && npm start"
scripts.prepare: node -e "process.env.CI || process.env.DOCKER_BUILD ? console.log('Skipping prepare in CI/Docker') : process.exit(1)" || npm run build
scripts.docker:up: npm run docker:cleanup && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up
scripts.docker:postgres:up: npm run docker:cleanup && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.postgres.yml up
scripts.publish:clean: npm run prepare-publish && cd publish && npm publish --access public

author: sparesparrow
